sections.heading: lands; expiration of lease; sale; mineral rights; appraisal; limitation on price; contiguous tracts; how treated
sections.text: All lands, now owned or hereafter acquired by the state for educational purposes, may be sold at the expiration of the present leases. The Board of Educational Lands and Funds shall retai
